title: Getting Even with the Billionaire
description: When Roxanne finds the man who shattered her heart back in high school, she comes up with a plan to get even with him. She plays a dangerous game and gets engaged. Roxanne‘s plan is going well, but love plays a fast one on her, and she finds herself falling hard for the CEO.She gets in over her head and, though her betrayal tears them apart, she’ll Ethan to step up and save her.Roxanne Parker is a different woman now, a far cry from the girl bullied in high school for being ugly. She’s managed to turn her life around completely and is loving being the pretty woman who gets all the attention.Ethan Barns went from playboy to responsible businessman overnight after his father's death. He’s struggling to fit in and to live up to his father's legacy.
author: Peyton Lawson
